Super power and 
<nobr>speedy motor.</nobr>
settings.text: Geleneksel saç kurutma makinelerinde yüksek sıcaklıklar kullanılırken Dreame saç kurutma makinesinde güçlü bir 110.000 dev/dk* yüksek hızlı 1600 W* Fırçasız Motor bulunur.
settings.custom_html_content:
*110,000RPM: Data from Dreame Labs. Under the standard laboratory environment (23±2℃).
* 1,600W: 1600W is the rated power. Data from Dreame Labs.

settings.content:
• Super fast drying.
    Dreame Hair Gleam High-Speed Hair Dryer offers an ultra-fast wind speed of 65m/s* and an air volume of 55m³/h*, providing a strong pressurized airflow for efficient drying. The airflow directly reaches the hair roots, gently removing the water from the hair's surface. Experience the freedom of hair care with a quick 3-minute* drying time.
    55m³/hAir Volume 65m/s Powerful Airflow Speed
    * 65m/s: Data from Dreame Labs. Under the standard laboratory environment (20±5°C).
    * 55m³/h: Data from Dreame Labs. Under the standard laboratory environment (20±5°C).
    *3-minute blow dry routine: Drying time may vary slightly according to the user's hair quality, hair volume, usage habits, ambient temperature, humidity, and other variables. The time displayed on the page is for reference only based on the average performance.
  • Super light. Extra convenient.
    Dreame Hair Gleam High-Speed Hair Dryer is ergonomically crafted with a motor for enhanced comfort. Weighing only 330g*, our hair dryer ensures fatigue-free operation even during hair styling.
    330g
    Ultra-Lightweight Body
    *330g: Data from Dreame Labs. The power cord and the nozzle are not obtained.
  • Super anti-static and smooth.
    Dreame Hair Gleam High-Speed Hair Dryer is equipped with a unique air duct design and a negative-ion emitter that releases 2 million negative ions*. Their mighty combination rapidly neutralizes static charges and effectively smooths the hair.
    2 million
    Negative Ions
    * 2 million negative ions: Data from Dreame Labs. Under the standard laboratory environment (23±2°C).

settings.title: Süper hızlı kurutma.
settings.text:
The airflow directly reaches the hair roots, gently removing the water from the hair's surface. Experience the freedom of hair care with a quick 3-minute* 1drying time.
55m³/hAir Volume2 65m/s Powerful Airflow Speed3

settings.title:
Super intelligent algorithm.
Super stable temperature.
settings.text:
Dreame Hair Gleam High-Speed Hair Dryer features intelligent temperature control to quick dry and keep your hair soft and shiny.
Prolonged exposure to hot air can lead to hair dryness, fragility, and breakage due to water evaporation and protein loss. Dreame Hair Gleam High-Speed Hair Dryer features intelligent temperature control to quick dry and keep your hair soft and shiny. A closed-loop control measuring 100 times/second* ensures a safe temperature of 57℃*, protecting your hair by making it glossy and smooth.
settings.custom_html_content:
*100 times/second: Data from Dreame Labs.
*57℃: Data from Dreame Labs.

settings.title: Süper hafif. Oldukça kullanışlı.
settings.text:

only 330g

settings.subtitle:
Dreame Hair Gleam Hair Dryer is equipped with a unique air duct design and a negative-ion emitter that releases 2 million negative ions*.
Dreame Hair Gleam High-Speed Hair Dryer is equipped with a unique air duct design and a negative-ion emitter that releases 2 million negative ions*. Their mighty combination rapidly neutralizes static charges and effectively smooths the hair.
settings.additional_content: *2 million negative ions: Data from Dreame Labs. Under the standard laboratory environment (23±2°C).

settings.title: Süper güç, daha az gürültü.
settings.subtitle:
Give yourself a quiet and elegant ambience during the blowdry at a noise level of 59dB*. Our hair dryer provides a peaceful blow-drying experience right for you.
Give yourself a quiet and elegant ambience during the blowdry at a noise level of 59 dB*. The Dreame Hair Gleam High-Speed Hair Dryer utilizes an efficient air duct system design to reduce shaking and friction. Our hair dryer provides a peaceful blow-drying experience right for you.
settings.additional_content: *59dB: The highest noise was measured in the Cool Air Temperature Level and High-Speed Airflow Mode.

settings.title: Süper güç, daha az gürültü.
settings.text: Give yourself a quiet and elegant ambience during the blowdry at a  noise level of 59 dB*. The Dreame Hair Gleam High-Speed Hair Dryer utilizes an efficient air duct system design to reduce shaking and friction. Our hair dryer provides a peaceful blow-drying experience right for you.
settings.custom_html_content: *59dB: The highest noise was measured in the Cool Air Temperature Level and High-Speed Airflow Mode.

settings.title: Oldukça şık kombinasyonlar.
settings.text:
Two airflow speeds and four temperature levels enable accurate styling. A colored LED indicator and intuitive button design suit your fashion needs, making your hair-drying experience simple.
Two airflow speeds and four temperature levels enable accurate styling. Hot Air Mode features precise temperature control with low hair damage while providing better styling options. Natural & Hot Circulation Mode allows you to switch between hot and cold air levels, saving you plenty of time, providing extra convenience, and offering various stylish combos. A colored LED indicator and intuitive button design suit your fashion needs, making your hair-drying experience simple.
settings.custom_html_content:
2 Airflow Speeds High-Speed Airflow Low-Speed Airflow
4 Temperature Levels Cool Air (25­°C) Warm Air (57­°C) Hot Air (85­°C) Circulation

settings.content:
• Product Name Dreame Hair Gleam High-Speed Hair Dryer
  • Voltage and Frequency 220-240V~ 50/60Hz
  • Airflow Speed 65m/s
  • Operation Modes Four temperature levels, two speed modes
  • Motor 110,000RPM high-speed motor
  • Nozzle Smoothing nozzle
  • Ion 200 million platinum anions/cm³
  • Noise ≤59 dB
  • Weight 330g (the power cord and the nozzle are not obtained)
settings.tips: *Data from Dreame Labs. The product depicted here is for illustration purposes only. Actual appearance and figure may vary.

settings.custom_html:
1:*65m/s: Data from Dreame Labs. Under the standard laboratory environment (20±5°C).
2:*55m³/h: Data from Dreame Labs. Under the standard laboratory environment (20±5°C).
3:*3-minute blow dry routine: The time displayed on the page is for reference only based on the average performance.
